revision.text:
{{codepointer|r=Strife}} '''A_SpectralLightningTail'''
(''no parameter'')
Spawns a {{Class|SpectralLightningHTail}} just behind the calling actor and transfers the health and angle from the calling actor. This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|SpectralLightningH1}} and derived classes.
